info.task: navigate forwards by ten options in listbox popup
info.title: Navigate forwards by ten options in a listbox popup

setupScript.name: openListbox
setupScript.description: sets focus on and expands the Combobox

user: with focus on the listbox popup, navigate forwards by ten options.
instructions.raw: with focus on the listbox popup, navigate forwards by ten options.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Text of the focused option in the popup ('Grape') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (not selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (11) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (13) is conveyed
